summary: Premium modern course-selling website for AI Academy (online learning platform) featuring a dark/glassmorphism UI, homepage marketing sections (hero, featured courses, ebook store, testimonials, offers), WhatsApp CTAs, and payment gateway integration with instant ebook delivery after payment.
architectural_notes: Project is a premium marketing + checkout website for AI Academy with courses and ebooks; design style: dark, royal blue/purple gradients, glassmorphism, smooth animations, fully responsive.
Payment integration to support Razorpay/UPI/Paytm/cards and trigger instant ebook delivery after successful payment.
known_issues: Unresolved requirements: delivery method for courses/ebooks (download link vs dashboard), whether user login is needed, and preferred payment checkout flow (redirect vs embedded/popup).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Premium edtech wordmark logo on dark background, sleek minimal style (ai-academy-logo.dim_512x256.png)
- Abstract dark gradient hero background with royal blue and purple light streaks, modern high-end (hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Course thumbnail: futuristic AI/brain/circuit illustration, dark premium (course-ai-mastery.dim_800x450.png)
- Course thumbnail: ChatGPT/assistant iconography, dark premium (course-chatgpt-earning.dim_800x450.png)
- Course thumbnail: freelancing/remote work abstract illustration, dark premium (course-freelancing.dim_800x450.png)
- Course thumbnail: social media growth abstract chart/phone illustration, dark premium (course-instagram-growth.dim_800x450.png)
- Ebook cover: AI tools themed, premium dark (ebook-ai-tools.dim_800x1200.png)
- Ebook cover: online earning themed, premium dark (ebook-online-earning.dim_800x1200.png)
- Ebook cover: freelancing blueprint themed, premium dark (ebook-freelancing-blueprint.dim_800x1200.png)
- Ebook cover: digital marketing themed, premium dark (ebook-digital-marketing.dim_800x1200.png)
- Testimonial result screenshot-style card image, dark UI with subtle numbers/graph (result-1.dim_900x600.png)
- Testimonial result screenshot-style card image, dark UI with subtle numbers/graph (result-2.dim_900x600.png)
- Testimonial result screenshot-style card image, dark UI with subtle numbers/graph (result-3.dim_900x600.png)
- Testimonial result screenshot-style card image, dark UI with subtle numbers/graph (result-4.dim_900x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a premium, high-end, trustworthy dark UI with royal blue/purple gradients, glassmorphism cards, smooth hover/scroll animations, and full mobile responsiveness; use professional typography (Poppins and/or Inter) and apply the style consistently across all pages/sections.

Implement the homepage with the specified sections and exact hero copy/CTAs: Hero (heading “Master AI & Digital Skills and Earn Online”, subtext “Learn AI, freelancing, and digital skills with practical courses & ebooks”, CTA buttons “View Courses”, “Buy Ebooks”, “Join WhatsApp”), Featured Courses, Ebook Store, Why Choose AI Academy, Student Results/Testimonials, Pricing & Offers (combo/discount/limited-time), WhatsApp CTA banner, and Footer with about/contact/WhatsApp/social icons/copyright.

Add data-driven product listings for exactly 4 featured courses (AI Mastery Course, ChatGPT Earning Course, Freelancing Course, Instagram Growth Course) and exactly 4 ebooks (AI Tools Ebook, Online Earning Ebook, Freelancing Blueprint, Digital Marketing Ebook), each showing name, price, image, and a buy button; enable “View Courses” and “Buy Ebooks” hero CTAs to scroll/navigate to their respective sections.

Implement WhatsApp contact integration across the site: all WhatsApp CTAs/buttons must open WhatsApp chat to +91 8171739752, including the dedicated WhatsApp CTA banner (“Need Help? Chat on WhatsApp”) and at least one persistent WhatsApp entry point (e.g., header or floating button).

Add a purchase flow that supports the listed payment options (Razorpay, UPI, Paytm, Debit/Credit card) by presenting a checkout UI where users select a payment method and proceed; implement a configurable payment-link strategy per product/method (stored in backend configuration) that can redirect users to the appropriate external payment URL when available, and provide a fallback instruction state (e.g., “Contact on WhatsApp”) when a link is not configured.

Provide “instant ebook download after payment” via a backend-managed delivery mechanism: after a purchase is marked paid, the user can download the purchased ebook file from the frontend (served as a static asset) through a gated download link/token created by the backend; include a simple “My Downloads” page that lists paid ebook purchases for the current session/principal and allows downloading.

Add a Testimonials/Student Results section with 4–6 review cards and an “earnings screenshots style” layout using provided/generated placeholder assets; ensure the section matches the premium glassmorphism theme and remains readable on mobile.

Generate and include required static images (logo, hero background, product thumbnails/covers, testimonial-style result screenshots) and render them from frontend static assets; do not serve generated images from the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create premium dark + gradient modern UI (glassmorphism cards, smooth animations/hover effects, mobile responsive, Poppins/Inter fonts) for AI Academy website
Build homepage sections: Hero with CTAs (View Courses, Buy Ebooks, Join WhatsApp), Featured Courses, Ebook Store, Why Choose, Testimonials/Results, Pricing & Offers, WhatsApp CTA banner, Footer
Implement product listings for 4 featured courses (price, image, buy button) and 4 ebooks (price, instant buy button)
Add WhatsApp integration/CTAs linking to +91 8171739752 (header/sections/footer button as needed)
Integrate payments (Razorpay, UPI, Paytm, Debit/Credit card) and support instant ebook download after payment
